Reviews.Title: Great choice!!
Reviews.Author: carlos castellanos
Reviews.Content: Camera is great for csc as far as pic quality. handling is good and only gripe is af speed as compared to other cameras in segment. Low light performance is best in class and on par with some full frame cameras. at iso6400 there's barely any noise in images, and detail levels are great. specially if reducing NR in menu.
